alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 14 at 2:29AM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph, resulting in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Phillips and Smith Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts remain uncertain with this system. A slight shift in the track of the approaching winter storm could have a significant impact on snowfall totals.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to updates in the forecast as snowfall amounts and impacts are likely to change over the next 12 to 24 hours.
